{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD mAP |revision=lite 2 (RBmAPL-2nD) |asin=B01BMMJVLI;, |fcc_date=12/24/2015 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |availability=common |type=access point |fcc_id=TV7MAPL2ND |pcb_id=GMT03070415 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=Micro USB |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=650 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16EG-AC |jtag=yes,, 10-pad header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS;Level 4; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |oui=00:0C:42, 4C:5E:0C |oui_eth=00:0C:42, 4C:5E:0C }} {{TagLine|Home Access Point}} :[http://routerboard.com/RBmAPL-2nD Product page]
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD mAP lite (RBmAPL-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RBmAPL-2nD RBmAPL-2nD] ('''mAP lite''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBMAP2ND TV7RBMAP2ND] :2.4GHz AP, 1x FE ports, PoE, 5V/1A, OUI: 00:0C:42, :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 @650MHz, 16/64MB <!--(Flash Winbond (SPI)/RAM Nanya (DDR2))--> :1.5dBi integrated Wi-Fi antennas {{see also|MikroTik|Gemtek}}
